item.create_mob_spawners.empty_soul_catc: Utilizes the power of condensed souls to capture mobs. Right-clicking a mob that has a _weakness_ potion effect will _capture_ its soul and store it inside. It can later be _released_ by right-clicking the desired position.
Entity is not weakened. Try applying a potion of weakness on it.
item.create_mob_spawners.soul_catcher.to: Contains a mob's soul. It can either be _released_ by right-clicking the desired position or placed inside a _Mechanical Spawner_.
block.create_mob_spawners.mechanical_spa: Utilizes the power of regenerative magic to spawn mobs. It needs _rotational force_, a supply of _Potion of Regeneration_ liquid and a _Soul Catcher_ placed inside to function.
create_mob_spawners.ponder.spawner.text_: Right-click the Spawner with a Soul Catcher to place it inside
The Spawner needs a supply of Potion of Regeneration to work
The Spawner also needs rotational force. The faster the rotation, the faster the spawning progress will finish.
Given some time, the Spawner will spawn the applied mob type on a nearby position
The Soul Catcher can be ejected by right-clicking the Spawner while sneaking
create_mob_spawners.waila.spawner_no_pro: Not enough Potion of Regeneration liquid
